Question.Subject: mobile broadband confused on what to do!?
Question.Content: Ive got an apple ibook g4,can I use the mobile internet dongles with this? Also at the mo Ive got virgin media broadband M and tv L package,the broadband is £20 a month with this.Ive just ordered a wireless router which was £40 and going on my next bill,Ive just been thinking about it and thought maybe its worth just going mobile broadband instead?If Idid how much do you think I would need?I'm on the net alot but dont really watch videos and I never play games,just generally surf,email,facebook that kind of thing. ta!
Question.ChosenAnswer: Move to mobile broadband if you think it will be useful.

Answer.Content: Move to mobile broadband if you think it will be useful.
